text: in 1959 a strapping young Trinidadian

go into that nimble polar moment it was

one of Mike's regular dancers in the
sixties was a young woman named Jean Lee
who Mike hired and took under his wing
for a few years until they went their
separate ways and lost touch for decades
Mike recently moved from his longtime
Greenwich Village apartment to an
assisted living residence in the Bronx
he's 79 years old now his magnificent

photos outside their room

me get as well he tells me how his

King and also a glam rock pioneer who's
flamboyant costumes and special effects
on stage were adopted by many performers
who cashed in on them in a way that Mike
never did
he tells Jean about his one-bedroom
